popover.primary: A mastery path focused on stabbin' things
A mastery path focused on survivability which means mor' killin' later
A mastery path focused on buffs and group support, cause everyone has some killin' ta do

data.name: 'Ave Another One
data.description: Follow 'me Lead will deal an additional 375 damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Bring 'Em On
data.description: Whenever you Parry, you immediately put your "Best Plan" in motion.

data.name: Can Youz Hear Me Now?
data.description: Cooldown on Shut Yer Face is reduced by 5 seconds and damage is increased to 427

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, making monsters hate you more. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect cannot be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Changin' Da Plan
data.description:
You suddenly realize that you could smash things better with a different plan.

No Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.
Da Good Plan: You gain Da Best Plan.
Da Best Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.

data.name: Dat Was Great!
data.description: Increases the duration of "Wot Armor?" by 10 seconds, and will now reduces target's toughness by 75.

data.name: Deafening Bellow!
data.description: All targets within 30 feet of you take 1200 damage and are Silenced, unable to use Magic for 5 seconds.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that reduces your target's armor by 1056 and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Don't Bother Me None
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: Get 'Em
data.description: An encouraging bellow that causes group members within 100 feet to regenerate Action Points 20% faster for 15 seconds.

data.name: Good Wif Shield
data.description: Increases Block Chance by 10% when using a shield.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: I'm Da Biggest!
data.description: Increases your Wounds by 160.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Lob Choppa
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 104 damage. Has a chance to deal 703 damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Lookin' For Opp'tunity
data.description: Clobber now removes 6 percentage points from your opponents Morale.

data.name: Loudmouth
data.description: War Bellows (Da Biggest, Da Toughest, Da Greenest) now also deal 225 damage to your offensive target.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Quit Yer Squabblin'
data.description: Every member of your group within 100 feet gains an additional 10% chance to Parry and Dodge for 30 seconds.

data.name: Raze
data.description: You repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away, for as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Increases Toughness by 160.

data.name: Save Da Runts
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description: You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer and all hate that they cause will be split evenly between the two of you.

data.name: Shatter Enchantment
data.note: Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and deals 127 damage.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Stab You Gooder
data.description: All of your critical hits will deal 25% more bonus critical damage.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and making monsters hate you more. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Walk it off!
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet gains 160 Toughness for 30 seconds.

data.name: Where You Going?
data.description: You root four enemies within 30 feet of you, preventing them fom moving for 10 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Youz see me blok' dat'?!
data.description: Whenever you Block an attack you gain 4 percentage points worth of Morale. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Keep It Goin'!
data.description: Increases damage on Big Slash to 180 and reduces cost by 10 Action Points.

data.name: Arm Breaka
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 127 damage. Removes 50 Action Points over 5 seconds.

data.name: Gork Smash!
data.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 10% when you have a Gud' Plan, and 20% while you have Da' Best Plan.

data.name: T'ree Hit Combo
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: You swing your weapon lots, dealing 213 damage every 0.8 seconds for 3 seconds. As Da' Big Boss would say, "Countin' is for Stuntiez."

data.name: Guud at Big Choppin!
data.description: When you are wielding a great weapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.

data.name: You Wot!?!!!
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: You think you heard someone say something about the size of your weapon. You fly into a rage for 20 seconds, dealing 10% more damage. Your armor and resistances increase by 30%, defences by 15% but when your rage subsides your moping means you will move at only 80% of your normal speed for 10 seconds.

data.name: Puddle o Muck
data.description: Deals 1200 damage over 15 seconds to all targets 40 feet in front of you. Affected targets are snared by 40% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Less Stabbin' Me
data.description: Increases Block and Parry by 5% when you have a Gud' Plan, and 10% while you have Da' Best Plan.

data.name: Can't Hit Me!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Increase Block Chance by 50%. While you are channeling, you can move at 60% movement speed. After you block, the attacker takes 175 damage.

data.name: Stop Hittin' Da Runts
data.description: You gain 40 Action Points whenever one of your War Bellows trigger.

data.name: Not in da face!
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 202 damage. Increases cooldowns on target by 5 seconds for 10 seconds. Group members within 100 feet become Unstoppable for 4 seconds, granting immunity to all Stagger, Knockdown, Disarm, or Silence effects.

data.name: Mor' Hardcore
data.description: Right in Da Jibblies and Ya Missed Me will now knock targets back a medium distance.

data.name: We'z Bigger
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals 177 damage. Increases the armor of all groupmates within 20 feet by 412 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Cant' Touch Us
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Group members within 100 feet will gain 200 Action Points and will absorb up to 3000 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: You Got Nuffin'
data.description: When War Bellows trigger they will now restore 270 health over 10 seconds to your group members within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Rock 'Ard
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 127 damage. Activates protective shield that absorbs up to 400 over 5 seconds.

data.name: Big Brawlin'
data.description: Big Swing now Snares for 40% for 5 seconds and Disorients, increasing build times by 25%.

data.name: Down Ya Go
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 352 damage and knocks target down for 3 seconds.

data.name: No Choppin' Me
data.description: Follow 'me Lead will also buff all groupmates within 30 feet of the defensive target.

data.name: WAAAAAAAGH!
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 173 Corporeal damage to all targets within 30 feet. Also reduces target's Corporeal resistance by 236 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Yer Nothin
data.description: Deals 1200 damage over 12 seconds to all targets within 30 feet in of you.  Affected targets lose 30 seconds of Morale over 12 seconds.

data.name: Wot armor?
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 102 damage. Reduces armor by 618 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Trip 'Em Up
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You "trip" your opponent by hacking at their legs for 127 damage, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Skull Thumper
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: A pounding blow to your opponent's skull that deals 177 damage and for the next 10 seconds their head will ring for 75 Corporeal damage whenever they are Critically hit.

data.name: Da Biggest!
data.note: War Bellow
data.description:
A mighty war cry that weakens your foes and gives you their strengths. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal 75 stat points from targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Da Big Un'
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: A mighty leaping strike with your axe which deals 176 damage to all targets 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Da Toughest!
data.note: War Bellow
data.description:
A grand war cry to proclaim yourself da toughest! All your attacks gain a 25% chance to increase your group's wounds by 32 for 10 seconds. Anyone affected will be healed by the amount increased.

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Tuffer 'n Nails
data.note:
Requires Shield
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You slam your shield into your enemy, dealing 152 damage. Increases Armor by 618 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Right in Da Jibblies
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You knee your target in a vital spot, inflicting 177 damage and reducing target's Weapon Skill by 75 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Ya Missed Me
data.note:
Requires Block
Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 127 undefendable damage. Target's physical damage done is reduced to 80% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Clobber
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Slashes for 152 damage, and generates extra hate against monsters.

data.name: Big Slash
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals 80 damage to targets 25 feet from you, and knocks them back.

data.name: Follow 'me Lead
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: You batter your target to show the runts how it's done. You deal 127 damage and buff Defensive Targets Weapon Skill by 75 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Savin' Me Hide
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 202 damage. Increases your Toughness by 75 for 20 seconds. Group members within 100 feet will take only 80% incoming magic damage for the next 4 seconds.

data.name: Da Greenest
data.note: War Bellow
data.description:
A Waaaghy bellow that raises resistances when hit. Incoming attacks have a 25% chance to increase resistance against that type of damage by 236 for 10 seconds on all group members within 100 feet. Physical damage will increase armor by 618 for 10 seconds for all group members within 100 feet

You may only have 1 War Bellow active at a time.

data.name: Shut Yer Face
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: You ruthlessly smack your target in the face, dealing 302 damage and silencing target for 4 seconds.

data.name: Big Swing
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You furiously swing your weapon in a wide circle, dealing 73 damage to targets within 30 feet and reducing their Strength by 75 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Modify War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You shield the Ram absorbing 1500 damage over the next 30 seconds.

data.name: Bulwark
data.note: Only usable on Doors
data.description: Repairs a friendly keep door for 5% of it's total health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Deflect Oil
data.description: 10% reduction in damage taken by Oil siege engines. You will also protect two other group mates within 30 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.  As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.  As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.  As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.  You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.  You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.  As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.  As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.  As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.
